explains: n. 骚乱，混乱；故意伤害罪，重伤罪；蓄意破坏

sentences.en: Their arrival caused mayhem as crowds of refugees rushed towards them.
sentences.cn: 他们的到来引起了混乱，一群群难民冲向他们。

sentences.en: With monetary mayhem now retreating into memory, European countries can breathe a collective sigh of relief.
sentences.cn: 随着金融混乱已成往事，欧洲国家全都可以松口气了。
